long_description: Enjoy the versatility of 24 gear combinations offered by the Electra Verse 24D bike and settle in for a comfortable ride that will take you anywhere in total style. Aluminum frame features internal cable routing for clean lines and protection from road grime; eyelets for fenders and a rear rack (sold separately) enhance utility. Sweeping top tube mimics a step-through design for easy mounting and dismounting. Shimano trigger shifters control the Shimano derailleurs for easy, precise shifts between the 24 gear combinations, letting you pedal with ease. Road-style, dual-pivot caliper brakes ensure speed management is easy and effective. Mixed Tread tires supply great versatility, providing smooth-rolling performance on roads, paths and hardpacked gravel. Convenient platform pedals do not require special shoes. Specs on the Electra Verse 24D bike are subject to change.
short_description: Enjoy the versatility of 24 gear combinations offered by the Electra Verse 24D bike and settle in for a comfortable ride that will take you anywhere in total style.
